params.sqlcmd: "select " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_NAME\\") as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\") as \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" decode(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_FLG\\", 0, M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\", T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"NON_NO_ITEM_PUCH_ODR_UNIT\\") as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" <= ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"DIRECT_FLG\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\""

"select " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE_ALL\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as RATE_JUDGE_DATE, " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"EXCH_RATE\\") as EXCH_RATE, " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\") as HOME_CUR_AMOUNT, " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\") as AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"update " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"set " +" \\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 2, " +" \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" \\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\" = decode(RATE_JUDGE_DATE, NULL, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), RATE_JUDGE_DATE), " +" \\"EXCH_RATE\\" = decode(RATE_JUDGE_DATE, NULL, to_number(?), EXCH_RATE), " +" \\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\" = decode(RATE_JUDGE_DATE, NULL, to_number(?), HOME_CUR_AMOUNT) " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" to_char(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as MODIFY_COUNT " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'JF*' and " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" = 1"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" <= ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"DIRECT_FLG\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
